name: Raving Rabbids Travel in Time
description: Raving Rabbids Travel in Time is a hilarious party game where Rabbids travel back in time in a washing machine to the greatest historical moments and mess them up! Play over 20 mini-games with 5 different types of gameplay including flying, dancing, jumping, and pointing games in different historical environments from pre-history to Egypt to King Arthur. You can sabotage your opponents and play seamless online/offline gameplay with up to 4 players. Pick between 30 unique historical costumes, such as Indian, Cowboy, Egyptian, and Musketeer.
